useCase.name: Learn Github
useCase.description: Employee learning and using Github functionalities

preconditions.precondition: Employee has identified the need for Github training

successEndConditions.condition: Employee has successfully participated in assigned Github issues

failureEndConditions.condition: Employee unable to navigate Github functionalities

mainSequence.step: Employee identifies the need for Github training with Resource
Resource provides access to Github Documentation and Tutorials to Employee
Documentation provides Guidelines and Tutorials to Employee
Employee explores Github functionalities through guided tutorials
Github demonstrates issue tracking and repository management to Employee
Employee navigates to assigned issues in Github Issue Tracker
Issue Tracker queries for issues tagged to Employee from Github
Github returns a list of assigned issues to Issue Tracker
Issue Tracker displays assigned issues to Employee
Employee participates in assigned issues by commenting and updating status
